thread.title: Sormeh Mahjouri
thread.title_full: Project Management Academy reviewed by Sormeh Mahjouri

author: Sormeh Mahjouri
title: Sormeh Mahjouri
text: I took the PMA class in Sacramento with Phil Jackson January 9-12, and just passed the PMP exam earlier this week! There was a 4-week study period between the time I completed the course and took the exam. Phil was my instructor and was incredibly helpful and patient as he reviewed the course material with the class. The online study plan, laminates, and practice exams are worth their weight in gold and were absolutely critical to my success on the exam. I was determined to pass on the first try, and I'm so grateful to PMA for making my goal a reality!
